main

Class Localizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Localizer

  • public class Localizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for the localization of the robot. It uses the ultrasonic or light sensors to localize the robot on the map.
    Author:
    Niloofar Khoshsiyar

      General localization method which performs ultrasonic and then light sensor localization in order

      Runs the ultrasonic localization.
